article_title: Alibaba to Offer Telecom Services in China
article_text:
BEIJING—China will allow e-commerce giant Alibaba and its closest rival to offer telecommunications services, giving private businesses a greater role in state-run industries such as telecommunications.

China's telecom regulator said on Thursday that it awarded licenses to 11 private companies to run mobile telecommunications businesses based on services leased from China's three state-run carriers. Analysts have long viewed the creation of the new businesses, known in the industry as virtual telecom service providers, as...
